post_text: The best insurance against dirty tricks is landslide margins of victory.

And ever increasing rolling protests up to the elections. #NoKings x 10

Fixing things is the job! Step up!
If women can grow and birth a baby in only 9 months, we can grow a voter registration drive!
A bad, ineffective way to get landslide margins of victory is to throw trans people under the bus and try to be Republican-lite

To be fair, we went to the polls in 2024 and wanted to get rid of Trump once and for all. Elon claimed victory for Trump 4 hours prior to the finals coming in. We know that the Trump admin is changing voting rules, bringing ICE to polls and doing things to voting machines. How do we win? Really?
Fulton County has been assaulted.
The best insurance against dirty tricks is Dem in Congress, together with state election officials, fighting like hell to preserve it.

The cons will get crushed in the '24 elections. Trump will declare them rigged and illegal. He'll immediately order a DOJ investigation and suspended all future elections pending the results. "Landslide margins of victory..." 
Bless your heart.

Every time voters give Dems the majority they refuse to do anything their voters want, enshrine the worst abuses of the previous Republican administration, and run the clock out while telling voters there's nothing they can do unless they get an even bigger landslide victory.

Ossoff is playing us.
You can’t keep moving the Overton window to where you don’t win unless you win big. We are just letting them set the narrative.
He did steal the presidency.

What if the biggest dirty trick is seizing voting machines after polls close, as Trump has already proposed? What systems are in place to prevent this? Can it be stopped in progress? This is my biggest concern right now.
Your such a breath of fresh air Jon ,come 2028 we need you in that race 🙏
Please consider running for president.
Exactly how much wider of a margin do we need, vs say the one we got in 2020, to get a Democratic party that consistently takes the threat of fascism seriously?
Maybe try to generate a plan B tho, since it’s your job???
john suckoff
Thank you!!!!! Everything you do and say gives me hope - I believe hope is a defiant act, and action is what we need - everything matters… supporting you in upcoming race

Right when I like what you’re saying & the courage & conviction w which you say it, you’re back w ineffectual (ridiculous) centrist (head in sand) position that it’s only the vote. Voting is essential but if all we vote for is for scared people to get in office, we go nowhere. 😖
This is a TERRIBLE message and implies a close win can be questioned! U were on a roll with ur other TPs but this is actually unmotivating!

I don’t disagree that a big margin would be incredible. But we can’t live in a world in which we win 50.1% and the opposition just screams like babies.

They will never agree to a losing election again. 2020 was round one.
The Laken Riley Act was beyond dirty.
#SecureTheElections

Here's my worry: Trump is told he can't control elections Federally. So, they pull this "rigged -election" f*ckery as a stall.

Sen Ossoff's term ends, and the governor must appoint someone to fill the vacancy. 

(Georgia law does not demand the appointee be from the same party. So +1 for Senate)
The best way to get a landslide is with candidates who believe in things.
It’s also about organizing poll watchers and having lawyers ready to sue. It’s about contesting every win.
Bless you 🙏 Jon donated 🙏⚖️🇺🇸🌎🕊️

replies.text: Article II, Section 4 establishes that the President, Vice President, and all civil officers of the United States can be removed from office through impeachment for treason, bribery, or other high crimes and misdemeanors.
